description: I'am a Passionate Student About the AR, AI, CV, Robotics, Research, Mathematics, Numerical Computing and Cloud Computing. MY ONLY AND REAL GOAL is to be accepted for a master's degree at MIT, thanks for the encouragement ;)
detailOrQuote: I am Currently Studying the 1st Semester of Data Science Bachelor at IPN, Where I learn that it's not about more data, it's about better data, Previously Mechatronic Technician
